title: Create reusable TextWithChips component
description:
Create a reusable component for steps 5-7 that combines open text input with toggleable chips.

File to create: app/fo-03/components/text-with-chips.tsx

Props interface:
- headline: string
- placeholder: string
- primaryChips: string[] (always visible)
- moreChips: string[] (shown when More is clicked)
- value: { text: string; chips: string[] }
- onChange: (value) => void
- onNotSure: () => void (skip handler)
- onContinue: () => void

Features:
- Textarea for free text input
- Toggleable chips that highlight when selected
- More button to expand additional chips
- Not sure / Continue CTAs
- Store both text and selected chips in value

This component will be reused for Steps 5, 6, and 7.
acceptance_criteria: npm run build succeeds; grep -l 'TextWithChips' app/fo-03/components/text-with-chips.tsx returns the file
closed_reason: Created reusable TextWithChips component at app/fo-03/components/text-with-chips.tsx. Component features: textarea for free text, toggleable chips with expand/collapse via More button, stores both text and selected chips in value object, disabled Continue when no input, uses framer-motion for chip animations, follows existing styling patterns.
